## RedemptionDetails.actualGUSDAmount property

Amount of GUSD that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualGUSDAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedGUSDAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
